details: Semester-long capstone for Statistics II: Data Analytics
Reit Data and Climate Change Risk Measures (Skiadopoulos et al.)
How climate change affects predicted housing rates in the US
Analyzing public and investor reactions to climate change and their impact on stock market
Comparing climate change trends in stock market to REIT performance data
Determine whether a correlation exists between climate trends and REIT performance
Use findings to project how climate change may influence the future housing market
Identify which generations are likely to be most affected by climate change housing impacts
